review: The set-up was quite easy but sometimes a movie I'm watching will stop and say my internet is to slow I had a internet speed that is quite fast so I went my internet provider and now have a faster speed but last night while watching a movie it stopped and said my internet was too slow which I don't think is the case over all though it's been a good streaming device I had a Google Chromecast previously and had problems constantly with it having to unplug it resetting passwords quite often. I think the Fire Stick is a good product but at time has a connecting problem.

review: Disappointed after several attempts to install this device on our TV exactly as instructed in the Quick Setup leaflet.  The remote never found the setup.  The setup never showed up on my TV with on-screen instructions.  Read all the "help" on in the PDF manual online but still nothing on my TV.  Tried both the direct USB connect and the HDMI connect but made no difference.  Don't know what is wrong but this device just is not working for me.  I expected an easy, problem-free, and simple setup but did not get it so the device is repackaged and just waiting for some insight.Don't know what else to try and attempting to "pair" with my Fire Phone is just not an option to complicate problems I am already having with my Fire Phone.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Got it half price and I love it.  We had been debating a roku purchase for a while and then Amazon offered this on sale and I jumped, for $19 how can you not?  Easy to set up, easy to use and not regretting the purchase.
